movies.title: Golden Slumber
movies.plot: When easy-going Aoyagi meets an old friend for a fishing trip, he ends up drugged, framed for the Prime Minister's assassination, and on the run from corrupt cops. It's only the beginning of what quickly becomes the worst, weirdest day of his life. But he'll get by with a little help from his friends, who include a famous pop diva, a rockabilly deliveryman, a crippled old gangster, and the world's most cheerful serial killer. Among the many puzzles of this twisty, clever film is how Nakamura manages to sneak a genuinely moving tribute to friendship into the madcap procession of perilous events. No matter what befalls Aoyagi, his friends and parents believe in him because of his steadfast, almost irrational pleasantness.
movies.simplePlot: When easy-going Aoyagi meets an old friend for a fishing trip, he ends up drugged, framed for the Prime Minister's assassination, and on the run from corrupt cops. It's only the beginning ...

biography.bio: Yûko Takeuchi was born on April 1, 1980 in Saitama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Ringu (1998), Be with You (2004) and Snowy Love Fall in Spring (2005). She was previously married to Shidô Nakamura.
biography.name: Yûko Takeuchi

biography.bio: Akira Emoto was born on November 3, 1948 in Ginza, Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for The Blind Swordsman: Zatoichi (2003), Shin Godzilla (2016) and Dr. Akagi (1998).
biography.name: Akira Emoto

biography.bio: Teruyuki Kagawa was born on December 7, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Tokyo Sonata (2008), Les contes de Terremer (2006) and Les démons à ma porte (2000).
biography.name: Teruyuki Kagawa

biography.bio: Masato Sakai was born on October 14, 1973 in Miyazaki, Japan. He is an actor, known for Key of Life (2012), Yukikaze (2002) and Legal High (2012). He has been married to Miho Kanno since April 2, 2013.
biography.name: Masato Sakai

biography.bio: Nao Ohmori was born on February 19, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ichi the Killer (2001), From Up on Poppy Hill (2011) and Vibrator (2003).
biography.name: Nao Ohmori

biography.bio: Ryushin Tei was born on January 10, 1973 in Hyogo Prefecture, Japan. He is known for his work on Zen (2009), Big Man Japan (2007) and The Code (2008).
biography.name: Ryushin Tei

biography.bio: Hidetaka Yoshioka was born on August 12, 1970 in Saitama, Japan. He is an actor and writer, known for The Place Promised in Our Early Days (2004), Always - Sunset on Third Street (2005) and La servante et le samouraï (2004). He was previously married to Yuki Uchida.
biography.name: Hidetaka Yoshioka

biography.bio: Gaku Hamada was born on June 28, 1988 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Sake-Bomb (2013), Miss Hokusai (2015) and Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013). He has been married to Miyuki Koizumi since July 2011.
biography.name: Gaku Hamada

biography.bio: Saki Aibu was born on June 20, 1985 in Hyogo, Japan as Aibu-Saki. She is an actress, known for Professor Layton and the Eternal Diva (2009), Koisuru naporitan: Sekai de ichiban oishii aisarekata (2010) and Neck (2010).
biography.name: Saki Aibu

biography.bio: Ken'ichi Takitô was born on November 2, 1976 in Nagoya, Aichi, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kenshin Kyoto Inferno (2014), Hana's Miso Soup (2015) and Ore no dandyism (2014).
biography.name: Ken'ichi Takitô

biography.bio: Shihori Kanjiya was born on December 12, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Swing Girls (2004), Survive Style 5+ (2004) and Parade (2009).
biography.name: Shihori Kanjiya

biography.bio: Sonim was born on March 10, 1983 in Kochi, Japan as Sonim Son. She is an actress, known for Hanging Garden (2005), Â! Ikkenya puroresu (2004) and The Backdancers! (2006).
biography.name: Sonim

biography.bio: Gekidan Hitori was born on February 2, 1977 in Chiba, Japan as Shogo Kawashima. He is an actor and writer, known for Memories of Matsuko (2006), Rebirth (2011) and Paco and the Magical Book (2008).
biography.name: Gekidan Hitori

biography.bio: Yukari Shiomi was born on March 7, 1981 in Okayama Prefecture, Japan. She is an actress, known for Rain Fall (2009), Helter Skelter (2012) and Golden Slumber (2010).
biography.name: Yukari Shiomi

biography.bio: Yûsuke Iizuka is an actor, known for Vital (2004), Isoroku Yamamoto, the Commander-in-Chief of the Combined Fleet (2011) and Golden Slumber (2010).
biography.name: Yûsuke Iizuka
